note.p: Dog breeder and judge of dogs. Policeman on the Great Western Railway, 1847, 1851. Coal merchant, living at 42 St Mary Abbott’s Terrace, West Kensington, 1871. Living in Exeter, 1901.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1466/315/38), 1871 (RG10/35/77/55), 1891 (RG12/20/172/18), 1901 (RG13/2018/22/5)
Kennel Club Calendar and Stud Book 11 (1884): 29 and 235
London, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1931 (Ancestry.com, accessed 22 November 2017)
